code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useParams,useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{getListing}from'../services/listingService';import ListingDetailModal from'../components/ListingDetailModal';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ListingDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const navigate=useNavigate();const[listing,setListing]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchListing=async()=>{try{if(!id){throw new Error('Listing ID is required');}const data=await getListing(parseInt(id));setListing(data);setError(null);}catch(err){setError('Failed to load listing');console.error('Error fetching listing:',err);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchListing();},[id]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-12",children:"Loading..."});}if(error||!listing){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-12 text-red-600",children:error||'Listing not found'});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-gray-100 py-12 px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-7xl mx-auto",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListingDetailModal,{listing:listing,onClose:()=>navigate(-1)})})});};export default ListingDetail;
